WizardTD

Class Fireball

  • java.lang.Object
    • WizardTD.Entity
      • WizardTD.Fireball
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Iceball

    public class Fireball
extends Entity
    The Fireball class is projectile that is fired at a target of the Enemy class. It tracks the target and inflicts damage when it collides with it.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected float damage 
      protected boolean isCollided 
      protected Enemy target 
      protected float targetX 
      protected float targetY 

      • Fields inherited from class WizardTD.Entity

        sprite, x, y

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Fireball(float startX, float startY, Enemy target, float damage)
      Creates a new Fireball instance with the specified attributes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getIsCollided()
      Checks if the fireball has collided with the target.
      void move()
      Moves the fireball towards its target;
      void tick()
      Updates the position using the move() function and checks if the fireball has collided with the target every game tick.

      • Methods inherited from class WizardTD.Entity

        draw, getX, getY, setSprite

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Fireball

        public Fireball(float startX,
                float startY,
                Enemy target,
                float damage)
        Creates a new Fireball instance with the specified attributes.
        Parameters:
        startX - The starting X-coordinate of the fireball.
        startY - The starting Y-coordinate of the fireball.
        target - The enemy target that the fireball is directed towards.
        damage - The amount of damage the fireball will inflict upon collision.

    • Method Detail

      • getIsCollided

        public boolean getIsCollided()
        Checks if the fireball has collided with the target.
        Returns:
        True if the fireball has collided with the target, otherwise false.

      • move

        public void move()
        Moves the fireball towards its target;

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Updates the position using the move() function and checks if the fireball has collided with the target every game tick.
